# [[swastika]]

====Usage notes====
This refers to a proper or counterclockwise swastika, {{l|ja|卍|tr=まんじ, manji}}, which used as a Buddhist symbol. The clockwise swastika used by the former Nazi Party is usually called {{l|ja|ハーケンクロイツ|tr=hākenkuroitsu}} from german "''[[Hakenkreuz]]''".
